name: Food and Drink 23 - Beer Quiz / Test | Wines, Beers and Spirits | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which was the first of the major breweries to produce tab-top beer cans?
questions.explanation:
Schlitz.

	A Pittsburgh brewery called Iron City was the first overall to use them. Schlitz followed suit only a few months after.
